name: Instagram Posts Checker
special_instructions: Only URLs to public profiles or posts are expected to work, everything else will return an error

The tool returns a variety of data fields for each Instagram profile or post, including url, followers_count, full_name, graphql_media, has_public_story, is_verified, owner_id, posts_count, profile_link, profile_link_ios, profile_pic_url, pronouns, type, username, verified, shortcode_media, __typename, id, shortcode, commenter_count, dimensions, display_url, display_resources, is_video, media_overlay_info, owner, taken_at_timestamp, edge_media_to_caption, edge_media_to_sponsor_user, is_affiliate, is_paid_partnership, like_and_view_counts_disabled, media_preview, location, edge_media_to_comment, edge_liked_by, coauthor_producers, pinned_for_users, edge_sidecar_to_children
The usage cost is around 0.02CUs per 100 posts or profiles
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
